hudson.plugins.python.Python.command: import sys,os,string,re,subprocess,smtplib,urllib2,time jenkins_url = "http://jenkins.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8080/view/integration_summary_packaging/job/integration_launch_nightly_builds/lastSuccessfulBuild/api/xml?xpath=/*/artifact[1]/fileName" output1 = urllib2.urlopen( jenkins_url).read() output1 = output1.replace("fileName", '') output1 = output1.replace("<", '') output1 = output1.replace(">", '') output1 = output1.replace("/", '') print output1
